Content.Text:
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, hello, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'm sorry, I'm in the midst of reorganizing my
shelves. Is there anything I can do for you?
Let's go on a date!
I came to help.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, did you not hear what I just said?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I would love to go with you, but I'm afraid I can't
at the moment.
<PAGE>
I'll make it up to you sometime, though, I
promise! But for now, could I please just ask
you to come back later?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee. Really, now? You always say the silliest
things, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I know you were joking, but let's pretend I took
you seriously and actually intended to let you
assist.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you work on this section, please?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's strange. Having you here helping me makes it
feel like we're a married couple, with you lending
a hand around the shop.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee. You look as stunned as a pigeon that's
just been plinked by a pop gun! It's a cute
expression. I rather like it!
<PAGE>
In fact, it makes me want to try saying more
embarrassing things to you, just to see if I can
bring out that face once more.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, please don't get mad! I'm not trying to be
mean. It's just one of many ways in which I
display my love for you.
<PAGE>
They do say the more you care for someone, the
more you want to pick on them, no?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee. Oh, yes! This reminds me of the time
you stopped by here before. Don't you
remember?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It was the day you joined me on my break, and
we played a little game of judgment.
<PAGE>
It's been a little while since then. Would you like
to play that game with me once more?
<PAGE>
This time, let's make it more interesting by
placing a bet on its outcome. If you win, let's
see... Ah, I know!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If you win, I'll give you a kiss as your prize!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here is the question. Which of these china plates
is more expensive: the one on the left, or the
one on the right?
Which do you think?
The blue one.
The grey one.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Correct. I knew you could do it.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now, here is your prize.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Erm...please don't stare at me with such obvious
anticipation. It's, ah...rather embarrassing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Now, close your eyes...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
YO, MISTEL!! Have you seen Klaus around? I'm
looking for that old guy and I can't seem to
find...him...any... ...uhhh...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Huh? <MYNAME>?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Klaus? He hasn't come here, no.
<PAGE>
If you haven't seen him in town, perhaps he's
out for a walk in the mountains?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, okay. Thanks! Sorry to bother you!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fritz.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
For a little while, might I suggest you watch
your back? And your feet, as well. And perhaps
above your head, too.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? What's that supposed to mean?
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Oh, nothing. You just never know what might
happen, is all. Be careful on your way home,
now!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Uh, okay. I will...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What an unfortunate interruption. I guess we will
have to save your prize for another time.
<PAGE>
I can handle the rest of the reorganization
myself. Thank you for your help.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let me see you to the door.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Unfortunately, that's incorrect.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was hoping you'd be correct as well, but now
I'm afraid you'll have to wait for another
opportunity. Ah, well...such is life!
<PAGE>
Now, then, only a little remains. Let's both hurry
up and finish our reorganization!
